definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)
building/shop/term for certain service establishments/embassy or consulate/schoolroom (old)/CL:家[jia1]

sentences.english: In another game, as the turtle swims across the oceanarium.
sentences.chinese: 在另一場遊戲中，當海龜遊過水族館時。

sentences.english: I would have raised enough money to buy them away from the Seaquarium and set them free.
sentences.chinese: 我會攢夠足夠的錢從水族館把他們買走，放他們自由。

sentences.english: There is an oceanarium located inside and also lots of waterworks.
sentences.chinese: 位於內有一個水族館，也是水廠手。

sentences.english: Lujiazui Area also has Ocean Aquarium and Riverside Promenade, etc.
sentences.chinese: 陸家嘴區域還包含海洋水族館，濱江大道等。

sentences.english: Lithuania's main aquarium is celebrating the birth of two baby dolphins.
sentences.chinese: 立陶宛的主水族館正在慶祝二隻小海豚的生日。

sentences.english: The Monterey Bay Aquarium shows visitors the underwater life in the bay.
sentences.chinese: 蒙特裏灣水族館向遊客展現了該海灣裏的海洋生物。

sentences.english: You may also work in an aquarium or a zoo.
sentences.chinese: 你可以工作在水族館或者動物園。

sentences.english: Shown in the figure is 100 feet long aquarium submarine channels.
sentences.chinese: 圖中所示的是水族館內長達100英尺的海底通道。

sentences.english: Everybody knew that the aquarium is the raising aquatic animal's place.
sentences.chinese: 大家知道水族館是飼養水生動物的地方。

sentences.english: Lesser quality stones have been used in quantities in ornamental gardens and as aquarium stones.
sentences.chinese: 小部分的雨花石已被用於花園裝飾和水族館用石。

sentences.english: Today, millions of people visit aquariums in more than thirty countries.
sentences.chinese: 現在，全世界有三十多個國家的數百萬人蔘觀水族館。

sentences.english: About fifty-eight million people visit these places each year.
sentences.chinese: 每年這些水族館大約要接待五千八百萬的遊客。

sentences.english: Both Stanley Park and Vancouver Aquarium are nice places.
sentences.chinese: 史丹利公園和溫哥華水族館都是美麗景點。

sentences.english: This shark was photographed at the Atlantis Resort at one of their aquariums.
sentences.chinese: 照片拍攝於亞特蘭蒂斯度假勝地一個水族館。

sentences.english: They have an aquarium. They have natural history.
sentences.chinese: 它們有一個水族館，還有自然歷史。

sentences.english: A diver swims with a moray eel during a press preview at the Sunshine Aquarium in Tokyo.
sentences.chinese: 在東京的陽光水族館，潛水員與熱帶海鰻與媒體見面。
